ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict

Interface RankedList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WordList
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TernaryTreeList

    public interface RankedList
extends WordList
    A word list that supports editable frequency ranks. Before setting the first of a series of frequency ranks, a call should be made to clearFrequencyRanks().

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict.WordList

        RANK_MAXIMUM, RANK_MINIMUM

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearFrequencyRanks()
      Removes all frequency rank data from the list.
      void setFrequencyRank(String word, int rank)
      Sets the frequency rank of word to rank.

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict.WordList

        add, addAll, clear, contains, getFrequencyRank, getSuggestions, getWordCount, getWords, hasFrequencyRanks, read, read, write, write

    • Method Detail

      • clearFrequencyRanks

        void clearFrequencyRanks()
        Removes all frequency rank data from the list. Subsequent requests to obtain a frequency rank will return -1. After calling this and setting the rank of at least one word, any words not explicitly set must have a rank of WordList.RANK_MAXIMUM.

      • setFrequencyRank

        void setFrequencyRank(String word,
                      int rank)
        Sets the frequency rank of word to rank.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to set the rank of
        rank - the frequency rank of the word, with 0 being most frequent
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the word is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the word is not in the dictionary
        IllegalArgumentException - if the rank is not in the range 0-255 inclusive
